org.openimaj.image.pixel

Class ValuePixel<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.pixel.Pixel
      • org.openimaj.image.pixel.ValuePixel<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the pixel value
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Readable, ReadableASCII, ReadableBinary, ReadWriteable, Writeable, WriteableASCII, WriteableBinary, Coordinate, Point2d
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FValuePixel, GenericValuePixel, IntValuePixel

    public abstract class ValuePixel<T>
extends Pixel
    An abstract class for objects that represent a pixel and its value. The value is read-only.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
